Title: A New Enemy
Description:
The horde is using dark magic to control beasts and corrupt their brethren down here, $n.

I intend to put a stop to it, but first I need to know what it is we're fighting against. That's where you come in.

Fight through the caverns and collect the insignia that the cultists carry. With them, I can study what type of magic is at work here.
ObjectivesText: Collect 5 Corrupted Insignia from the Dark Shaman cultists.
RewardText: Good work, $n. Now we can figure out what it is they were trying to achieve down here.
